column4: Does anyone know if Gnome has a featureful launch menu a la KDE4/Vista? I want to be able to search on program names then launch with a click, as well as browse by category.
I believe only openSUSE/SLED implements this.
But if it's in opensuse then it's open source... hmm... might go surfing ftp.opensuse.org :)
If you like... heheh. I think it's their extension that they do, might be worth looking at
